amendatorysection.para: For purposes of the Motor Vehicle Operator's License Act, the following federal regulations are adopted as Nebraska law as they existed on January 1, 2011:
The parts, subparts, and sections of Title 49 of the Code of Federal Regulations, as referenced in the Motor Vehicle Operator's License Act.

source.note: The Revisor of Statutes has pursuant to section 49-769 correlated LB178, section 3, with LB212, section 5, to reflect all amendments.
Changes made by LB212 became effective February 23, 2011. Changes made by LB178 became effective August 27, 2011.
